title: The Salt Domes of North Bandar Abbas
content: A group of salt domes has appeared in the west and north of Bandar Abbas as well as on the way to Haji Abad. Anyone of these domes has its features and beauties. Angooran salt dome is a dynamic dome whose upward movement can be recognized by its changes in its rock cover. This big dome is on the way to Bandar Abbas- Angooran accessible to the interested people.
